titleStmt.title: A declaration of the loyall resolution of the Kingdome of Scotland. Being a voluntary oath by them taken for the preservation of his Maiesties Sacred Person, and for the maintenance of his undoubed [sic] rights and priviledges to his severall kingdomes. With their protestation of severe prosecution against all those that shall attempt, impugne, or by any sinister meanes be abettors, councellors, undertakers or disturbers of the same.

A declaration of the loyall resolution of the Kingdome of Scotland. Being a voluntary oath by them taken for the preservation of his Maiesties Sacred Person, and for the maintenance of his undoubed [sic] rights and priviledges to his severall kingdomes. With their protestation of severe prosecution against all those that shall attempt, impugne, or by any sinister meanes be abettors, councellors, undertakers or disturbers of the same.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
